posts.post_title: FS 2 T206s HOFers Tinker & Evers Old Mill & Polar Bear
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have these two ungraded T206 cards for sale. Tougher backs.

Evers, Polar Bear back, vertical crease from the bottom through the pants.

Tinker, Old Mill back, horizontal crease across the hands & shoulder.

Price: $110.00 each. Delivered.

Paypal, check or money order.

Thanks,

Joe
